name: Pebbles!
description:
Pebbles! This entry was made for the game jam: Lame Jam 18.
Collect pebbles and find your drip!



All songs used are provided by Epidemic Sound.
Jimmy Joe - Blue Topaz
Sunshade Cops - Radio Night
Shake It Off - The New Fools
Funk This Up - Fox Morrow

Thank you for playing!
